title: Discussion on  Infinity Edge
body:
What do you guys currently think of Infinity edge as an item?
Overall i feel like Infinity Edge as an item is boring and feels mediocre buying it each game.

replies.body:
I like Infinity Edge better than moat stat sticks, though my perception of the item comes primarily as a Yasuo main. IE having lost 10% crit chance isn't an issue anymore since they buffed all the Zeal items to 30% crit, but it also lost 20 attack damage, which **is** an issue.

I get wanting to reduce AD across the board during the marksmen update, but it left IE in a spot where it doesn't feel as great as it should when you finish it.
because IE is much better when you have other crit items aside to it. you can't rush an IE and expect it to be a good powerspike.
